main event: An unidentified flying object was observed in Upland, California, on September 5, 1957, described as a green flash of light with red tails.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 15 minutes., The object was reported to be at an altitude of approximately 6,000 feet., No sound was reported during the observation., The observer's identity is noted as James G. Hicks., Different hypotheses were proposed concerning the object, including it being a balloon or aircraft.
sighted object: green flash of light with red tails
